website_summaries.verdict: Classic Accessories makes a cover that does double duty – one cover goes over two wheels. Some customers liked this option because they didn't want to fool with two separate covers for wheels right next to each other.
pros: You get a single cover for both wheels
Soft, non-scratch backing that's both UV- and mildew-resistant
Protects against dirt, rust and harmful UV rays
Vinyl tire cover has a fast and easy slip-on fit
1 dual-axle wheel cover in each package
cons: Does not come with cords to tie down in case of wind

customer_reviews.title: OverDrive RV Dual Axle Wheel Cover, Grey, Large
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 Dual Axle Wheel Covers because after reading others posted here on AMAZON they don't come in pairs, you would think they would or have the option of clicking on buying 2; Package arrived here today. I put them on and WOW to say the least they fit snug with a little extra room, which you want them snug so the wind don't blow them off easy(I would call it a PERFECT fit !!!!!!!) ; We have a 2006 model 30' Bumper pull style Toyhauler with Tires sizes ST235/80R16 Load Range E (10PR)
customer_reviews.author: R. Sandel

customer_reviews.title: Well made and fit perfect, year later and still in great shape.
customer_reviews.text: UPGRADE TO 5 STAR. We used the tire guide provided online, and our wheels are covered perfectly without the cover touching the ground. The quality is good. We decided on these covers because we use X-Chocks between our tandem wheels as we are on a hill. We are very happy with our purchase. The price and quality are very good! Arrived on time. 4 star because we haven't tested them over time. You will need a bungee cord for each cover.
customer_reviews.author: Janet A.

customer_reviews.title: Great fit / Great price!
customer_reviews.text: Great fit on my fifth wheel travel trailer! Price was very reasonable for the quality! Super easy to install and seems very durable and tough. 3 year warranty so we'll see how it does over time. If I wanted to complain about anything, it would be that there is no string included to tie the back corners together. It's okay for me, because I plan to use bungee cords for convenience anywsy, but a piece of cord would be nice for those that don't have quick access to a bungee
customer_reviews.author: E. Elliott

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy.  Measure & get a snug size and it will stay on beautifully!
customer_reviews.text: This fits very nicely. Although you should use bungies or other fasteners to hold it on (not included), this actually fits so snugly on our tires that we haven't needed to do so. This is sturdy and we expect it to last a long time. We have one of those RVs with "earth tone" swirlies on it, so I didn't think the gray would go. In retrospect, it might have been a little less "look at me!" but, on the other hand, you're not going to forget to take it off...! Very glad to have purchased this cover.
customer_reviews.author: MysteryPoodle

customer_reviews.title: Classic Accessories 80-108-041001-00 Large RV dual wheel cover; grey.
customer_reviews.text: Our two axle towable RV trailer has the 16" 'G' rated tire package upgrade, and these covers fit like a glove! Very well made, but I recommend cleaning/using a UV resistant dressing on it every 3 months as one of ours (on the sunny side) got dried and cracked after about a year; replaced under warranty. We used this company for wheel covers on our other trailer and our tow vehicle, and really like them as well. Would recommend this product to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: YerDaddy

customer_reviews.title: Trailers need 2 covers
customer_reviews.text: The description said nothing about only one cover. One would think that since 99.9% of all trailers have wheels on both sides, they would have two covers in the box. It looked well made but there was only one cover in the box so I returned it. But if I had a trailer with 2 wheels on only one side, this cover would have been awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Michael P.

customer_reviews.title: Great products
customer_reviews.text: The wheels on my RV have never looked better. From beginning to end perfect transaction. The wheel covers (which I bought 2 of) were great. The covers had a thick soft inside liner, and the black vinyl was stitched to perfection I would definitely recommend this company to anyone looking to get exactly what you paid for and more Shipping was fast and the packaging was good. I will be placing another order for my spare tire. 5 star seller.
customer_reviews.author: christine fenton

customer_reviews.title: Black seems to beat gray with these.....
customer_reviews.text: For some reason this black dual cover for each side of a dual wheeled trailer or RV, has not deteriorated in the sun like my gray ones.. Don’t know why, but it still looks good like the day it was new. It does sag a bit more than the single wheel type due to there being more fabric unsupported by the wheels. It doesn’t fit as tight as a single cover.
customer_reviews.author: Lazarus

customer_reviews.title: Quick Delivery & What We Expected
customer_reviews.text: These were less expensive than what we were going to purchase at a major camping store and arrived in 2 days! They don’t appear to be any different than others we have purchased but since they are new I can’t say how long they will last. We have tough winters so protecting our tires is important in the winter and in the summer we like to keep the sun off them as much as possible. Overall we are pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be good quality and look nice too.
customer_reviews.text: Proper size for my tires, and essential when using wheel stabilizer chocks between the wheels. Only issue is they don't come with kind of tie straps, but I used an appropriate length bungee cord, and that works OK. Waiting to see how they hold up in our notorious weather extremes in Colorado. I ordered the Grey, which matches our camper's full size storage cover very nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Goodman

customer_reviews.title: RV wheel cover
customer_reviews.text: Only comes 1 ea./box which was not clearly described in advertisement. Good quality but 2X $ of the second cover I needed to buy that turned out to be the same quality and material than this one. So be aware that you will need to buy 2 ea. of this cover and pay 2X what the competition charges for SAME quality.
customer_reviews.author: Jan Figone

customer_reviews.title: Fit great
customer_reviews.text: Fit my Jayco Eagle 330RSTS like a glove. Perfect fit. I don’t know about it’s durability as I have just put them in but they seem well built. Just a FYI they do not come with any straps or ties to secure them behind the tire at the bottom using the eyelets.
customer_reviews.author: J. Hines

customer_reviews.title: Previously ordered by another customer
customer_reviews.text: when i opened the box and removed the wheel covers i instantly knew that they were previously ordered and probably where not the correct size for tires and were returned. The outside cover was dirty and the inside was covered with dirt and leaves. I took them inside and cleaned both the inside and outside. They do fit our RV tires perfectly but I do not appreciate being sent a dirty product. In the future I will open each item and inspect.
customer_reviews.author: Denise D.

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty and easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install. A little tying up behind the tires. I think a bungee cord might have worked better than the rope I used. Very heavy duty vinyl. Looks great hiding the tires and keeping the sun off the tires for seasonal campers or when the rv will be stored.
customer_reviews.author: C. montgmery

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install/stays put!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install, they have a nice snug fit about them (unlike previous ones we’ve owned). I’m sure they’ll do a fine job of protecting the tires throughout the winter months.
customer_reviews.author: Coconutbean

customer_reviews.title: A little disappointed. What I thought was a pair was one
customer_reviews.text: I thought these come as a pair there was only one in the box. A bungee time is needed for the back of the cover to pull and snuggly but one did not come in the box.
customer_reviews.author: James Nardone

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Was extremely please on opening up the box. Was really expecting something thin and very light weight. These are neither. Very good quality with lined interior. Fit extremely well and good looking. Bought the ones "For Up to 27" Diameter Tires" for my 2018 Coleman Light 2405BH.
customer_reviews.author: Bama

customer_reviews.title: Quantity of the items in the box
customer_reviews.text: Heavy weight material , but = DO NOTE - THERE IS ONLY ONE ITEM IN A BOX ! Why only 1 im not sure ....but dont get catfished with the small print or expecting (like any normal person) that it came in a set .
customer_reviews.author: A. Zuccarello

customer_reviews.title: appear to be of very good quality, fit nicely and look great
customer_reviews.text: We just received two of them so do not have a long history to report on durability. They were delivered on time, appear to be of very good quality, fit nicely and look great. They fit nicely over the dual wheels and are easy to install. We used our own bungee cords to secure them. They are lined and feel great. The grey color does not stand out like the white color does. We are very happy.
customer_reviews.author: DRM

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit for 205/75r14
customer_reviews.text: This fit like a glove over a pair of 205/75r14's. Good material. Looks nice! I'm willing to bet I won't even need to cinch up the back flaps it fits so well (though I will for long term storage.)
customer_reviews.author: leo wink

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: I already had the single tire versions of these covers but when using X-chocks, it became an issue so I bought these instead. They are of the same quality I liked about the single tire versions and now I can install my X-chocks first then cover up both tires, hiding the X-chocks as well.
customer_reviews.author: Grover517

customer_reviews.title: Please do not buy.
customer_reviews.text: I thought I was buying a seat of two tire covers. But it come in and open the box to find out it only has one tire cover. Who in their right mind sells one tire cover when there's 2 tires to cover on a travel trailer. Stupid people that don't no what there doing.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Hearon

customer_reviews.title: Good protection
customer_reviews.text: Does a great job protecting the tires from sun degradation. Fits well easy to install. You need to provide your own bungee cords
customer_reviews.author: Drd

customer_reviews.title: Great Looking and Great Coverage
customer_reviews.text: I didn't add any fasteners, just installed the covers over the tires. The fit was very good for my unit so installation was extremely easy. Not sure how easy if I had to tag them down though. I've only had them a couple weeks so can't really comment on durability. They seem good and soft.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon L

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and fit.
customer_reviews.text: These fit well and look good. The bungi cord you have to install at the bottom is a little bit if a challenge since you have to crawl under the trailer to get it hooked up but they work well.
customer_reviews.author: VV

customer_reviews.title: Looks good, fits well
customer_reviews.text: Fits (although we could probably have gone with either of two size choices and chose the smaller size), has stayed on. We are in Florida and have had them on about a month and still looks good. Bought two packages, one for each side, reasonable price. Pleased with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great look and nice workmanship.
customer_reviews.text: These look great. They are a bit loose and long, but they are designed to fit up to 30 inch wheels and mine are 29 inch. I would definitely recommend these. Well made and seem durable.
customer_reviews.author: steven s.

customer_reviews.title: No grommets
customer_reviews.text: They were suppose to have grommets in them and only one set had them. Not very happy with this.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: Protect those tires
customer_reviews.text: Fits as advertised, RV tires take a big enough beating, protecting them can't hurt. The covers are well made and fit well. So far they are staying on alright and we've had some wind. So far very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: GP

customer_reviews.title: Frustrating
customer_reviews.text: Something wrong with the carrier if the shipment was returned. Have used the address many times without a problem. Frustrating
customer_reviews.author: Robert Hurd

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Originally we had cheap white single covers, we are so glad we got the dual tire cover and the material is so nice! Very good quality and the look is very sharp!
customer_reviews.author: KLebron3

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and good, worth the investment!!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit for our 24 foot travel trailer with dual axles 15 inch tires. It sure protects them for dust and mud when the trailer is parked st the campground. We like it well enough to buy a second set.
customer_reviews.author: Camping Again

customer_reviews.title: Very well made wheel covers
customer_reviews.text: Going on my second year with these covers installed. Very well made. Heavy. And I know they are protecting my wheels from the elements.
customer_reviews.author: 19danny48

customer_reviews.title: Rv tire cover
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install around tires. Great product to keep the sun of the tires while rv is in storage. Recommend to help save your tires.
customer_reviews.author: chelsea

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product...fits very well
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product...fits very well. My only issue is that they should be a bit clearer with their listing to say that the purchase is for one, not two covers!!! Also, my guess is that should also come with some sort of rope to connect the grommets behind the tires... Buying two of these gets a bit pricey in my mind....
customer_reviews.author: Joel

customer_reviews.title: better than expected
customer_reviews.text: Just got the wheel covers and they were better quality than I expected. They fit great over my 32" wheels on my RV. glad I bought them
customer_reviews.author: Ela Scott

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: Better than I was expecting. The material is heavy and covered the wheels on my toy hauler going on easy and perfectly snug.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy L

customer_reviews.title: Good fitting
customer_reviews.text: I was able to fit this over the tires with the wheel chucks in place. Had a few pretty good wind storms and they didn’t budge. I’ve had them 3 months now.
customer_reviews.author: Lara

customer_reviews.title: There is only one per package
customer_reviews.text: So we only needed one of these as the other side of our trailer is in the shade 100% of the time. It was a plus for us to order just one. YMMV. The material is pretty good. It takes two people to install and if you are worried about it flapping around in the wind, you might want to use a bungie cord to secure it. That might require you to crawl under the trailer... but maybe not.
customer_reviews.author: K Oden

customer_reviews.title: Tire covers
customer_reviews.text: They look heavy duty and well made. We'll see how they hold up in the blazing southern facing sun this year. Better the cover that the tires.
customer_reviews.author: wagonmaster615

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: Wow, perfect fit with no need for further securing. Received promptly and installed 5 minutes per side. Looking good!
customer_reviews.author: WJ

customer_reviews.title: Good material
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my RV. I like them just wish they would have came with a little string/rope to secure them . Not a deal breaker though!
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea Layton

customer_reviews.title: no ties to keep them in place
customer_reviews.text: we’re ok for the price didn’t have ties too hold them in place one blew away and had to replace
customer_reviews.author: Pengy68

customer_reviews.title: The product works.
customer_reviews.text: I used to use two sets of covers (4 total) to protect 2 sets of dual axle tires. The singles kept blowing off. The new set is very well worth the extra money.
customer_reviews.author: Homey D. Clown

customer_reviews.title: Nice covers!
customer_reviews.text: These covers fit perfectly. Arrived quickly and well packaged. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It worked...
customer_reviews.text: Just what we needed for protection of our trailer tires thru the winter.
customer_reviews.author: just shelly

customer_reviews.title: Fit nicely and look good
customer_reviews.text: Fit nicely and look good..you have to provide your own rope or bungee cord to secure the bottom. They are a nice weight not just flimsy vinyl. We are happy with the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good fit for dual wheel.
customer_reviews.text: Nice wheel covers. They are what I wanted. I was disappointed that there was no rope or cord with them. I had to buy rope.
customer_reviews.author: Linda and Dave Sinkovich

customer_reviews.title: The fit of these covers is great, not too snug nor too loose
customer_reviews.text: I based my purchase on other reviews. One particular reviewer had dimensions which helped, because my trailer was very close. The fit of these covers is great, not too snug nor too loose. I've found I don't need to put a bungee behind the tires to keep them on... they seem to stay by themselves just fine. I'm happy with them and would recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Johns

customer_reviews.title: Excellent cover very easy to use
customer_reviews.text: It looks and feels like very high-class covers. Looks very good on my trailer.
customer_reviews.author: DEW

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Fit our 2018 Hideout 5th wheel perfectly. Decent quality too.
customer_reviews.author: Thomasbeau

customer_reviews.title: Dual Axle Covers
customer_reviews.text: Excellent fit for my dual axles on my Airstream Flying Cloud. Easy to install and the grey color complements the color of the trailer. Tie grommets work well. The covers have been installed for about 3-weeks withe no loosening or stretching, fits like a glove.
customer_reviews.author: TrainMan

customer_reviews.title: You have to order two of them!
customer_reviews.text: This product is as bad as buying curtains. Make sure you order two because it only comes for one side of your RV. Little things like this is what makes a product bad.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Good fit
customer_reviews.text: One new one good used couldn’t tell witch one. Fast delivery well packed. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Randall C. Williamson

customer_reviews.title: Fits good
customer_reviews.text: Fit fine, need a summer or two to check durability
customer_reviews.author: mark everett

customer_reviews.title: Its Ok...
customer_reviews.text: dont like that its felt like material inside, no purpose.
customer_reviews.author: S. Galicz

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: I though is two sets one for each side my mistake got to get one for the other side. Looks great
customer_reviews.author: Henry

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: Best well made great material wheel covers. These stay on excellent. Good peotection. Outstanding material. I've used RV and truck wheel covers since 1984 and these are the best I've seen or used.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put on and take off which is what ...
customer_reviews.text: We got these for pur camp trailer and they seem to be doing what they are supposed to. Easy to put on and take off which is what I was looking for since we are usually parking the trailer when it's hot out and taking too long in the heat is exhausting.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: The best RV tire cover
customer_reviews.text: the product is actually better than we thought. We use it to cover our RV tires and it looks impressive. The cover is a perfect fit. The cover is very durable and does the job.
customer_reviews.author: moose

customer_reviews.title: They are nice covers and will use them
customer_reviews.text: My wheels measured 30" and 8" in between. So I ordered the covers for the 30" tires. The covers are way to big and I don't care for the plastic grommets. They are nice covers and will use them. My next purchase will be the next size smaller.
customer_reviews.author: Gene

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty no strap to tie
customer_reviews.text: Love it but no elastic strapes to tie it. The hoes are there .. I ordered 2 sets and no straps. How do I get them?
customer_reviews.author: Maryann Reese

customer_reviews.title: These are great. I like the two tire cover as compared ...
customer_reviews.text: These are great. I like the two tire cover as compared to my old single covers. Also the Gray color looks good on the camper.
customer_reviews.author: Jackl

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Fit well. Sturdy material. Easy to install over tires. Update may '19. Showing much cracking
customer_reviews.author: r

customer_reviews.title: Like the material used
customer_reviews.text: The product is made very well. Like the material used. Although I order larger covers than I needed, the grommets holes allowed us to bunggie cord them together making he fit tighter. Love the new appearance to the RV that it gives along with the UV protection.
customer_reviews.author: delaney

customer_reviews.title: Great option for tire covers!
customer_reviews.text: Great look, easy set up and the ultimate protection for my seasonal parking of the travel trailer!
customer_reviews.author: stoneyunit

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great delivery.
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to install and it’s heavy duty material. This is the second one we purchased because we like them so much.
customer_reviews.author: Chief Dave

customer_reviews.title: Great set of wheel covers.
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly on our 2020 Genesis Supreme 5th Wheel. There should be a bungee included to secure the back side. The covers are heavy duty, fairly easy to use and are nice looking.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Johnston

customer_reviews.title: Love the fit and looks good!
customer_reviews.text: Protects those tires, so far so good,been in the elements for a few months and haven't had any issues.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Good fit
customer_reviews.text: Fits well, no need for binge at back. So far long lasting
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great price and looks really nice.
customer_reviews.text: These are a great price and they are made good. Looks great
customer_reviews.author: kightrider52

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for protecting my travel trsiler’s tired Also perfect fit.
customer_reviews.author: Liv

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fits our 33' travel trailer dual wheels nicely and protects our mechanical wheel immobilizers from the elements.
customer_reviews.author: MyMomSaysIAmCool

customer_reviews.title: fits Grand Design 303 RLS
customer_reviews.text: I am happy with the fit,the black looks good with the trailer.
customer_reviews.author: Brian S. Abbott

customer_reviews.title: necessity
customer_reviews.text: purchased this for my travel trailer to keep the sun off my tires. fit perfectly and seems to be of good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Albert Lustig Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Good product at a good value
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t had the product that long but it seems to be constructed of good material and easy to install... The only downfall is trying to get bungee cords on the backside to keep it from blowing off
customer_reviews.author: Jan Rasmussen

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit two axle travel trailer 205/75 r14
customer_reviews.text: Fit perfectly on two axle travel trailer. 205/75 r14. No way yet of know how they will hold up over time
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These were a perfect fit for our RV
customer_reviews.text: These were a perfect fit for our RV. Nice heavy material. I purchased the white ones as I think the color would reflect the heat better. Would recommend to the RV travelers.
customer_reviews.author: Tall Pines

customer_reviews.title: Order two for set!
customer_reviews.text: Fits dual tire as expected. Only one cover is included. Order two for set!
customer_reviews.author: Shelley A.

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: Is only one side what a crap How they post it without letting people know
customer_reviews.author: Bernhard F.

customer_reviews.title: Only one side.
customer_reviews.text: This is one cover not a pair. Works nice fits nice.
customer_reviews.author: Zavier

customer_reviews.title: Impressed!
customer_reviews.text: Fit 25' travel trailer perfect. Heavy materials, appear these will last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Paul C

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: poor desc ended up only 1 wheel cover fits sloppy
customer_reviews.author: ronsrn

customer_reviews.title: Wheel covers
customer_reviews.text: Covers work perfect, easy to place over tires of our travel trailer and they stay in place protecting the tires.
customer_reviews.author: Jill B W

customer_reviews.title: Work very well
customer_reviews.text: Holding up well. They fit snug enough to prevent strong winds from blowing them off as well.
customer_reviews.author: William Fahey

customer_reviews.title: Not a set
customer_reviews.text: Only has one cover for one side. This is not a set for both sides
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: All looks good for now
customer_reviews.text: All looks good but only time will tell on the durability which would then give me an idea of the material quality. So no stars on these two points.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Good quality great price!
customer_reviews.text: Very good twin axel wheel covers. Easy to install, good quality!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product, but take some cord with you for installation
customer_reviews.text: After several months, it seems to be holding up well to the elements. As others have said - why the heck did they not include a cord to tie it up???
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Know your size before ordering
customer_reviews.text: Other than there were no cords and it did not indicate only one per box the shipping and time it took to get the items were good.
customer_reviews.author: clarence

customer_reviews.title: for a boat trailer
customer_reviews.text: Good fit on the twin axles of my boat trailer with 205/14/75 tires. Used some bungy cords on the back to hold them in place. Big winds today as I type this and they are not moving at all.
customer_reviews.author: Pops and Lin

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit and so easy to install. Nice way to protect tire investment and jazz up the looks at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: Peaceful10

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: 1 Season after I bought them and the are working great on my trailer. They perform well in high wind even without a tie down.
customer_reviews.author: Charles F. Meiklejohn

customer_reviews.title: Don't hesitate to buy this product.
customer_reviews.text: I have had other wheel coverings like these, but these are the nicest I have owned. Good quality material and fit.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Muench

customer_reviews.title: fit my RV tires perfectly, have holes to attach ...
customer_reviews.text: fit my RV tires perfectly, have holes to attach bunjee cords to keep in place, but fit so well almost don't need them, even in very windy NM!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mary F.

customer_reviews.title: ... appear to be well made and will be of good service. My main complaint is the grommets that ...
customer_reviews.text: The covers appear to be well made and will be of good service. My main complaint is the grommets that are installed on the backside of the covers easily come loose if even a small amount of tension are placed on them. If it were not for this issue, I would have rated them a five.
customer_reviews.author: Ken Newman

customer_reviews.title: Fit is good, color is good
customer_reviews.text: Fit is good, color is good, but they sent these covers without a method of tightening them on. It would be nice to have at bungee strap included.
customer_reviews.author: VictoryRider

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Rv tire cover, just used for the first time. I could do a more detailed review after I have used the product for awhile.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Leedie

customer_reviews.title: They are pretty descent tho
customer_reviews.text: The eyelets ripped almost the first time I used them. They are pretty descent tho.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: About half the story
customer_reviews.text: There are two sides to every trailer, this package only has half of what you need. Purchase 2 to take care of all four tires of your trailer.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

product_meta.title: Classic Accessories OverDrive RV Dual Axle Wheel Cover, Grey, Small
product_meta.description: Color:Grey| Size:Up To 27" Wheel DiameterProtects tires and wheels against sun damage. Fits up to 27 inch wheel diameter.
feature_bullets: Waterproof, wipe-clean vinyl with soft, non-scratch backing
Two rear eyelets secure the bottom flaps for a neat look
NOTE: Refer user manual before use

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars693 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
